posts.title: Estimating truncation effects of quantum bosonic systems using sampling algorithms

author.name: qBraid Team
author.title: Research
author.bio: Experimenting with classical sampling to bound quantum simulation errors.

posts.excerpt: Learn how classical sampling methods, such as Markov Chain Monte Carlo, can estimate truncation errors in simulating bosons on quantum computers, aiding resource assessment and result validation for quantum simulations, including applications in two-dimensional lattice scalar field theory.
